docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
شسیشسیشسی alisda asd .

گوگل

  • mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Game
docs.text: A game is a structured form of play, usually undertaken for enjoyment and sometimes used as an educational tool. Games are distinct from work, which is usually carried out for remuneration, and from art, which is more often an expression of aesthetic or ideological elements.

docs.title: Types of Games
docs.text:
Games can be classified into many genres, such as:

  1. Board Games: These games include classics like chess, checkers, and monopoly.
  2. Video Games: These can range from simple games like Tetris to complex MMORPGs like World of Warcraft.
  3. Card Games: Examples include poker, solitaire, and bridge.
  4. Sports: Physical games like football, basketball, and soccer.

docs.title: Elements of a Game
docs.text:
Many games share common elements:

  • Rules: All games come with a set of rules that dictate how it is to be played.
  • Goals: A defined objective that players strive to achieve.
  • Interaction: Many games involve interaction between players.
  • Outcome: The result of the gameplay, typically identifying a winner and a loser.

Games can be a great way to stimulate the mind, foster social interaction, and have fun.

docs.title: Movies
docs.text: Movies, also known as films, are a type of visual communication that uses moving pictures and sound to tell stories or teach people something. Most people watch (view) movies as a type of entertainment or a way to have fun. For some people, fun movies can mean movies that make them laugh, while for others it can mean movies that make them cry, or feel afraid.

docs.title: History of Movies
docs.text: Movies have been around for over a century, with the first short moving picture released in 1895. Since then, technology has greatly improved allowing for better visuals and sound. The first full-length movie to be shown was "The Story of the Kelly Gang" in 1906.

docs.title: Types of Movies
docs.text:
There are many different types of movies. Some of the most popular include:

  • Action Movies: These types of movies are high in energy with lots of physical activities including fights, chases, explosions, and more.
  • Comedy Movies: These movies aim to make the viewers laugh through humor.
  • Drama Movies: These are serious movies that depict realistic characters, settings, life situations, and stories involving intense character development and interaction.
  • Horror Movies: These movies aim to frighten and panic, cause dread and alarm, and to invoke our hidden worst fears.
  • Romantic Movies: These movies are centered around romance and passion. They can also include great humor.

docs.title: Conclusion
docs.text: Movies can bring joy and happiness, they can inspire, and they can make us think. They can help us to understand more about ourselves, our world, and people in different places. They are a universal language, and a great movie is a great movie regardless of its country of origin.
